ConversationMessageDefinition.label: How do I stake on Ndax - mobile web

primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
1. Log in to your Ndax account. 2. Tap the Ndax logo at the top left 3. Tap on Staking 4. Choose the asset you'd like to stake and tap Stake 5. Select a staking plan (if available), then tap Continue 6. Enter the amount to stake, then tap Continue 7. Review the plan details and tap Start Staking
Please note that there is a bonding period between 1-3 days. Once the bonding period is complete, your crypto will begin earning rewards!
